Robotic Arm Kinematics

Modeling a 4-DOF arm with forward/inverse kinematics and CAD integration.

Overview

This project focused on building a kinematic model using Denavit-Hartenberg parameters and validating workspace reachability with simulation.

Highlights

  • Developed DH parameter tables and symbolic forward kinematics.
  • Implemented inverse kinematics solver in MATLAB.
  • Aligned CAD geometry to the analytical model for validation.
